content: wave lengths men s scarf this wave lengths scarf has a classy look that gives you a great visual texture without being too overwhelming change the colors around to create a perfect fit for that special guy in your life this pattern could easily be unisex depending on the colors and type of yarn used the scarf is a relatively simple design using basic stitches done in a block style supplies worsted weight #4 yarn i used red heart fiesta in 6012 black and red heart super saver in 0313 aran about a ½ skein each hook i 5 5mm tapestry needle to weave in ends abbreviations st ~ stitch chain ~ chain single_crochet ~ single_crochet half_double_crochet ~ half_double_crochet double_crochet ~ double_crochet pattern chain 168 or desired length in sets of 8 plus 2 step 1~ in 3rd chain from the hook *double_crochet in next 4 st then single_crochet in next 4 st repeat from *across chain 2 turn step 2~ half_double_crochet across chain 2 turn step 3~ *double_crochet in next 4 st single_crochet in next 4 st repeat from *across changing color in last stitch chain 2 turn step 4~ *double_crochet in next 4 st single_crochet in next 4 st repeat from *across chain 2 turn step 5~ half_double_crochet across chain 2 turn step 6~ *double_crochet in next 4 st single_crochet in next 4 st repeat from *across changing color in last stitch chain 2 turn repeat steps 4-6 5 more times or until desired width finish off and weave in all ends
